Trainers

Here at Iron Pulse, we have a variety of trainers specialising in functional strength and metabolic conditioning. Our team is dedicated to helping you master the fundamentals of lifting while pushing your cardiovascular limits. Whether you’re looking to hit a new personal best in the squat rack or torch calories in our high-intensity zones, our coaches provide the expert technical cues needed to ensure every rep counts.

Meet the team

John Davies

Specialising in progressive overload and functional barbell movements, John helps members build a rock-solid foundation. His coaching philosophy centers on the belief that strength is the master quality that improves every other aspect of life. If you want to master the squat, deadlift, or overhead press with perfect form, he is your go-to coach.

Head of Strength & Conditioning

Samantha Phillips

Samantha is the driving force behind our high-intensity zones. Specialising in metabolic conditioning and anaerobic endurance, she designs workouts that push your heart rate to the limit while keeping motivation at an all-time high. Her sessions are fast, fierce, and engineered to maximize the 'afterburn' effect long after you leave the gym

HIIT & Performance Specialist

Thomas Horn

With a background in athletic performance, Thomas specialises in plyometrics and explosive HIIT. He excels at breaking down complex, fast-paced movements into achievable steps for all fitness levels. Whether you are a beginner or a seasoned athlete, his goal is to increase your "Pulse"—improving your speed, agility, and mental toughness.

Explosive Power & Cardio Lead

Kim Palmer

Kim focuses on the intersection of power and precision. She specialises in helping members build lean muscle while improving joint mobility and core stability. Her classes are perfect for those who want to look athletic and move fluidly, combining traditional resistance training with corrective exercise to prevent injury.

Functional Strength & Mobility Coach
